description: a(n) = smallest composite solution x to the equation phi(x+2n) = phi(x)+2n.
references: Sivaramakrishnan, R. (1989): Classical theory of Arithmetical Functions. Marcel Dekker, Inc., New York-Basel. Chapter V, Problem 20, page 113.
prog: (PARI) a(n)=forcomposite(x=4,, if(eulerphi(x+2*n) == eulerphi(x)+2*n, return(x))) \\ does not handle -1s; _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 28 2015
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 26 2000
extensions: More terms from Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org) Jun 14 2003
Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 28 2015
